what: HRSWGS: Hard Red Spring Wheat breeding Genomic Selection toolbox — HRSWGS-package
title: HRSWGS: Hard Red Spring Wheat breeding Genomic Selection toolbox — HRSWGS-package
text: Custom functions help data wrangling formatting using genomic selection hard red spring wheat breeding programs. Format genotypic phenotypic data, perform genomic prediction communicate results.

title: HRSWGS: Hard Red Spring Wheat breeding Genomic Selection toolbox — HRSWGS-package
text: Maintainer: Charlotte Brault charlotte.brault@live.com

what: Run genomic prediction on all genotypes, output predicted values — compute_GP_allGeno
title: Run genomic prediction on all genotypes, output predicted values — compute_GP_allGeno
text: Run genomic prediction genotypes, output predicted values

title: Run genomic prediction on all genotypes, output predicted values — compute_GP_allGeno
code: compute_GP_allGeno(   geno,   pheno,   traits,   GP.method,   runCV = FALSE,   testSetGID = NULL,   nreps = 10,   nfolds = 10,   h = 1,   nb.mtry = 10,   nIter = 6000,   burnIn = 1000,   ntree = 100,   p2d.temp = NULL,   nb.cores = 1,   p2f.stats.cv = NULL,   p2f.pred = NULL,   verbose = 1 )

title: Run genomic prediction on all genotypes, output predicted values — compute_GP_allGeno
text: geno genomic data genotypes row (GID rownames) marker columns. Values column centered scaled. pheno phenotypic data genotypes row (GID column) traits columns traits character vector trait names, must correspond pheno column names GP.method character vector genomic prediction methods use, must one "rrBLUP", "RKHS", "BayesA", "BayesB" runCV logical, TRUE, run cross-validation common genotypes pheno geno, default FALSE testSetGID GID test set genotypes, NULL, provide predicted genotypic values genotypes geno nreps number repetitions cross-validation, default 10 nfolds number folds cross-validation, default 10 h bandwith parameter RKHS, default 1. nb.mtry number randomly selected variables split RandomForest, default 10 nIter number iterations RKHS, default 6000 burnIn number burn-iterations RKHS, default 1000 ntree number trees RandomForest, default 100 p2d.temp path directory export temporary genomic prediction results, default NULL (cause error parallelization NULL). nb.cores number cores parallelize computation, default 1 (parallelization) p2f.stats.cv path file export cross-validation genomic prediction results, default NULL p2f.pred path file export genotypic values genomic prediction, default NULL verbose integer, level verbosity, default 1

title: Run genomic prediction on all genotypes, output predicted values — compute_GP_allGeno
text: data frame predicted values genotypes traits

title: Run genomic prediction on all genotypes, output predicted values — compute_GP_allGeno
text: Charlotte Brault

what: Compute genomic prediction different methods — compute_GP_methods
title: Compute genomic prediction different methods — compute_GP_methods
text: Compute genomic prediction different methods

title: Compute genomic prediction different methods — compute_GP_methods
code: compute_GP_methods(   geno,   pheno,   traits,   GP.method,   nreps = 10,   nfolds = 10,   h = 1,   nb.mtry = 10,   nIter = 6000,   burnIn = 1000,   ntree = 100,   p2d.temp = NULL,   nb.cores = 1,   p2f.stats = NULL )

title: Compute genomic prediction different methods — compute_GP_methods
text: geno genomic data genotypes row (GID rownames) marker columns. Values column centered scaled. pheno phenotypic data genotypes row (GID column) traits columns. Phenotypic value corrected year location effects beforehand. traits character vector trait names GP.method character vector length one genomic prediction methods use. Must one "rrBLUP", "GBLUP", "RKHS", "RKHS-KA", "RandomForest", "BayesA", "BayesB" "LASSO". nreps number repetitions cross-validation, default 10 nfolds number folds cross-validation, default 10 h bandwith parameter RKHS, default 1. multiple values provided, method RKHS Kernel Averaging. nb.mtry number mtry RandomForest, default 10 nIter number iterations RKHS, default 6000 burnIn number burn-iterations RKHS, default 1000 ntree number trees RandomForest, default 100 p2d.temp path directory export temporary genomic prediction results, default NULL (cause error parallelization NULL). nb.cores number cores parallelize computation, default 1 (parallelization) p2f.stats path file export genomic prediction results, default NULL

title: Compute genomic prediction different methods — compute_GP_methods
text: list following elements: obspred observed vs. predicted genotypic values, gp.stats genomic prediction statistics

title: Compute genomic prediction different methods — compute_GP_methods
text: Charlotte Brault

what: Concordance of names between reference and match data Matching of names will be done based on the spelling of the names, without punctuation. — concordance_match_name
title: Concordance of names between reference and match data Matching of names will be done based on the spelling of the names, without punctuation. — concordance_match_name
text: Concordance names reference match data Matching names done based spelling names, without punctuation.

title: Concordance of names between reference and match data Matching of names will be done based on the spelling of the names, without punctuation. — concordance_match_name
code: concordance_match_name(   match.name,   ref.name = NULL,   allowNoMatch = TRUE,   corresp.list = NULL,   verbose = 1 )

title: Concordance of names between reference and match data Matching of names will be done based on the spelling of the names, without punctuation. — concordance_match_name
text: match.name character vector names match (format) ref.name character vector reference names. Default NULL needs provided corresp.list NULL. allowNoMatch logical, keep values match.name even match, default TRUE corresp.list named list correspondence names, correct spelling name possible synonym character vector, default NULL. provided, add new correspondence list. conflict ref.names corresp.list, name corresp.list used. verbose integer, level verbosity, default 1

title: Concordance of names between reference and match data Matching of names will be done based on the spelling of the names, without punctuation. — concordance_match_name
text: list 3 elements: correspondence data frame, updated correspondence list, vector new names applied match name.

title: Concordance of names between reference and match data Matching of names will be done based on the spelling of the names, without punctuation. — concordance_match_name
text: Charlotte Brault

what: Create table and file to add accession to T3 — create_accessions_T3
title: Create table and file to add accession to T3 — create_accessions_T3
text: Create table file add accession T3

title: Create table and file to add accession to T3 — create_accessions_T3
code: create_accessions_T3(   dat = NULL,   checkDB = TRUE,   p2f = NULL,   return_table = TRUE,   accession_name = NULL,   population_name = NULL,   `organization_name(s)` = NULL,   `synonym(s)` = NULL,   `variety(s)` = NULL,   `country_of_origin(s)` = NULL,   `notes(s)` = NULL,   `accession_number(s)` = NULL,   purdy_pedigree = NULL,   filial_generation = NULL,   species_name = "Triticum aestivum" )

title: Create table and file to add accession to T3 — create_accessions_T3
text: dat data frame genotype information checkDB logical, whether check T3 database BrAPI package exclude accessions already database, default TRUE. p2f path file write output function return_table logical, whether return table , default TRUE. accession_name character string, name column dat contains accession name population_name character string, name column dat contains population name purdy_pedigree character string, name column dat contains purdy pedigree filial_generation character string, name column dat contains filial generation species_name character string, name species, default "Triticum aestivum" (fixed). `organization_name(s)` charac6er string, name column dat contains organization name `synonym(s)` character string, name column dat contains synonym name `variety(s)` character string, name column dat contains variety name `country_of_origin(s)` character string, name column dat contains country origin `notes(s)` character string, name column dat contains notes `accession_number(s)` character string, name column dat contains accession number

title: Create table and file to add accession to T3 — create_accessions_T3
text: data frame accessions add T3 return_table TRUE, otherwise file written path p2f

title: Create table and file to add accession to T3 — create_accessions_T3
text: Charlotte Brault

what: Create table and file to add phenotype data in T3 — create_phenot_T3
title: Create table and file to add phenotype data in T3 — create_phenot_T3
text: Create table file add phenotype data T3

title: Create table and file to add phenotype data in T3 — create_phenot_T3
code: create_phenot_T3(   dat = NULL,   df_corresp_trait = NULL,   p2f = NULL,   return_table = TRUE,   plot_name_col = NULL )

title: Create table and file to add phenotype data in T3 — create_phenot_T3
text: dat data frame phenotypic data, containing least plot name traits df_corresp_trait data frame correspondence column names dat traits T3, must countain columns T3_trait corresp_col. p2f path file write output function return_table logical, whether return table , default TRUE. plot_name_col character string, name column dat contains plot name, default "plot_name"

title: Create table and file to add phenotype data in T3 — create_phenot_T3
text: data frame phenotypes add T3 return_table TRUE, otherwise file written path p2f.

what: Create table and file to add trials to T3 — create_trials_T3
title: Create table and file to add trials to T3 — create_trials_T3
text: Create table file add trials T3

title: Create table and file to add trials to T3 — create_trials_T3
code: create_trials_T3(   dat = NULL,   checkDB = TRUE,   p2f = NULL,   return_table = TRUE,   location_state_corresp = NULL,   keepID = NULL,   year = NULL,   location = NULL,   accession_name = NULL,   transplanting_date = NA,   plot_number = NA,   planting_date = NA,   harvest_date = NA,   block_number = NA,   is_a_control = NA,   rep_number = NA,   range_number = NA,   row_number = NA,   col_number = NA,   plot_width = NA,   plot_length = NA,   field_size = NA,   seedlot_name = NA,   num_seed_per_plot = NA,   weight_gram_seed_per_plot = NA,   prefix_BP = "URSN",   is_private = NA,   design_type = "RCBD",   trial_type = "phenotyping_trial",   description = "Cooperative nursery of scab trials",   breeding_program = "Regional Scab Nursery Cooperative" )

title: Create table and file to add trials to T3 — create_trials_T3
text: dat data frame trial information checkDB logical, whether check T3 database BrAPI package exclude trials already database, default TRUE. p2f path file (xlsx extension) write output function return_table logical, whether return table , default TRUE. location_state_corresp list, named list correspondence state (Canadian province) location, default NULL. provided, default list used. keepID character string, ID column keep table (returned exported) year character string, name column dat contains year, mandatory. location character string, name column dat contains location, mandatory. accession_name character string, name column dat contains accession name, mandatory. transplanting_date character string, name column dat contains transplanting date. plot_number character string, name column dat contains plot number. present, increasing number 1000. planting_date character string, name column dat contains planting date. harvest_date character string, name column dat contains harvest date. block_number character string, name column dat contains block number, present, filled 1. is_a_control character string, name column dat contains control status, filled 0/1. rep_number character string, name column dat contains rep number, present, filled 1. range_number character string, name column dat contains range number. row_number character string, name column dat contains row number. col_number character string, name column dat contains column number. plot_width character string, name column dat contains plot width meters. plot_length character string, name column dat contains plot length meters. field_size character string, name column dat contains field size. seedlot_name character string, name column dat contains seedlot name. num_seed_per_plot character string, name column dat contains number seed per plot. weight_gram_seed_per_plot character string, name column dat contains weight seed per plot grams. prefix_BP character string, prefix breeding program, default "URSN". is_private character string, name column dat contains private status, set 1 private. design_type character string, name column dat contains design type, default "RCBD". trial_type character string, name column dat contains trial type, default "phenotyping_trial". description character string, name column dat contains description trial, default "Cooperative nursery scab trials". breeding_program character string, name column dat contains breeding program, default "Regional Scab Nursery Cooperative".

title: Create table and file to add trials to T3 — create_trials_T3
text: data frame trials add T3 return_table TRUE, otherwise file written path p2f

title: Create table and file to add trials to T3 — create_trials_T3
text: Charlotte Brault

what: Format and curate vcf file — format_curate_vcf
title: Format and curate vcf file — format_curate_vcf
text: Format curate vcf file

title: Format and curate vcf file — format_curate_vcf
code: format_curate_vcf(   vcf.p2f = NULL,   matrix.gt = NULL,   mrk.info = NULL,   corresp.geno.name = NULL,   p2f.export.vcf = NULL,   IDnum = FALSE,   remove.chrUkn = TRUE,   check.mrk.dups = TRUE,   remove.nonPolyMrk = TRUE,   tresh.heterozygous = NULL,   check.geno.dups = TRUE,   thresh.NA.ind = 0.5,   thresh.NA.mrk = 0.5,   format.names = FALSE,   concordance.function = FALSE,   corresp.geno.list = NULL,   imputation = NULL,   p2f.beagle = NULL,   thresh.MAF = NULL,   verbose = 1 )

title: Format and curate vcf file — format_curate_vcf
text: vcf.p2f path vcf file matrix.gt matrix genotypes, must contains CHROM POS columns, default NULL mrk.info data frame marker information pulled vcf, columns CHROM, POS, ID, REF, ALT, QUAL, FILTER, INFO, FORMAT, default NULL. Needed vcf.p2f provided p2f.export.vcf null. corresp.geno.name table correspondence genotype names, first column name matched second one updated name. p2f.export.vcf path export curated vcf file, default NULL (export), useful Beagle imputation. IDnum logical, remove prefix idxx. genotype name, default FALSE remove.chrUkn logical, remove markers unknown chromosome, default TRUE check.mrk.dups logical, check duplicated markers, default TRUE remove.nonPolyMrk logical, remove non-segregating markers, default TRUE tresh.heterozygous numeric, threshold maximum proportion heterozygous genotypes, default NULL check.geno.dups logical, check duplicated genotypes, default TRUE thresh.NA.ind numeric, threshold maximum proportion missing values individuals, default 0.5 thresh.NA.mrk numeric, threshold maximum proportion missing values markers, default 0.5 format.names logical, use custom function transform genotype names, default FALSE imputation character, impute missing values kNNI Beagle impute, default NULL (imputation) p2f.beagle path export file Beagle imputation, default NULL thresh.MAF numeric, threshold minor allele frequency, default NULL verbose numeric, level verbosity, default 1

title: Format and curate vcf file — format_curate_vcf
text: data frame 0/1/2 values curated vcf file, genotypes row markers columns.

title: Format and curate vcf file — format_curate_vcf
text: Charlotte Brault

title: Format accession names — format_names
text: Format accession names

title: Format accession names — format_names
code: format_names(   names,   toupper = TRUE,   dashToUnderscore = FALSE,   pedigree = FALSE,   verbose = FALSE )

title: Format accession names — format_names
text: names character vector accession names toupper logical, set upper case, default TRUE dashToUnderscore logical, transform dash underscore, default FALSE pedigree character vector pedigree? TRUE, remove slash strings verbose logical, default FALSE

title: Format accession names — format_names
text: list initial corrected names

what: Format phenotypic data from GrainGenes (Excel tables) — format_phenot
title: Format phenotypic data from GrainGenes (Excel tables) — format_phenot
text: Load Excel files containing phenotypic data GrainGenes, multiple locations years. Combine one data frame separate genotype information phenotypic data.

title: Format phenotypic data from GrainGenes (Excel tables) — format_phenot
code: format_phenot(p2d, years, locs, traits, cols2rem = NULL, distMatchTrait = 8)

title: Format phenotypic data from GrainGenes (Excel tables) — format_phenot
text: p2d path directory tables saved years numeric vector years look locs character vector tab names look (including Entry) location names identify trial. several names corresponding one trial, repeat different versions vector add final name vector name. traits character vector trait names look . several names corresponding one trait, name different versions use vector name sought version. example: traits=c("VSK","Heading","FDK"); names(traits)=c("VSK","HD","VSK") cols2rem character vector column names remove, avoid bad matching distMatchTrait numeric value, distance string matching. Default 8. Increased distance lead matching prone errors.

title: Format phenotypic data from GrainGenes (Excel tables) — format_phenot
text: list 4 components: var.match.info: data frame variable matching sheet.match.info: data frame sheet matching (finding relevant tabs) phenot: data frame combined phenotypic data years locations entry.info: data frame combined genotype information

title: Format phenotypic data from GrainGenes (Excel tables) — format_phenot
text: Charlotte Brault

title: Setup prediction scenarios — setup_scenarios
text: Setup prediction scenarios

title: Setup prediction scenarios — setup_scenarios
code: setup_scenarios(   myPheno,   scenario,   envs.train = NULL,   envs.pred = NULL,   ignore.genos = NULL,   traits = NULL,   genos = NULL,   prop.CVS1 = 0.8 )

title: Setup prediction scenarios — setup_scenarios
text: myPheno data frame containing least following columns: gid (genotype identifier), env, value (trait phenotype) scenario one knEnv, knLoc.knYr, knLoc.nYr, nLoc.knYr, nLoc.nYr. knEnv known environment, including sample observations testing environment, well environments, knLoc.knYr known location, known year, knLoc.nYr known location / unknown year, nLoc.knYr unknown location, known year, nLoc.nYr unknown location / unknown year. envs.train (optional) restriction environments training set, provided environments considered envs.pred (optional) restriction environments testing set, provided environments considered ignore.genos (optional) character vector genotypes exclude testing set, including training set, typically check genotypes traits (optional) character vector trait column(s) genos (optional) character vector restricted genotype list, typically genotyped lines. prop.CVS1 numeric, proportion genotypes testing set scenario knEnv, default 0.8.

title: Setup prediction scenarios — setup_scenarios
text: list one lement per testing (environment) set. Within testing set, list training environment, testing environment, genotypes training testing sets, phenotypic data training testing sets.

title: Setup prediction scenarios — setup_scenarios
text: Charlotte Brault
